item.description:
-We will be departing from point Judith, RI on 9:00 AM ferry
Departing on 7:00PM ferry from Block Island.
R.T. same day fare is $17.40 per person.
http://www.blockislan...
-Lunch at Finn's overlooking the harbor
Finn?s Seafood Restaurant
Water Street, 466-2473.
Enjoy our lunch or dinner menu open to close. Our fish market next door guarantees the freshest seafood. Chowder, burgers, lobster, steak.
-Renting moped or bicycles at Aldo's
Aldo?s Mopeds
Weldons Way, 466-5018.
- Sight-seeing
The lighthouse, the bluffs, touring the island. shopping or relaxing on the beach
- Dinner by the wharf
-depart via 7:00 pm ferry
http://www.blockislan...
item.name: Block Island Day Trip
